description: Dr. Knox is a military surgeon specializing in autopsy, especially in fire-related deaths. He appeared after Colonel http://anidb.net/ch6586 [Roy Mustang] has killed Second Lieutenant http://anidb.net/ch10166 [Maria Ross]. Even though he remarks to Mustang later that the burnt corpse he had received in no way resembled a woman who had died by incineration, he covers up for the Colonel and officially records the body as Ross` according to her dental records because he and Roy had been comrades during the Ishval Civil War.
name: Knox
